title: Victorious ward not received
body:
It has been a while since season ended, I received all  the rewards except the ward
are there other people who have this issue?

replies.body:
In order to get the Victorious Ward Skin, you needed to have placed Silver or higher in 2 ranked queues. It looks like you did hit silver in Ranked Solo, but only Bronze in Ranked Flex so it didn't qualify for the ward skin.

https://i.gyazo.com/ca64a3d2824dfe6d37056e9741d77434.png
